content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 1, Sunderland 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 1, Sunderland 0.
Attempt blocked. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
Substitution, Sunderland. Mikael Mandron replaces Stéphane Sessegnon.
Offside, Sunderland. John O'Shea tries a through ball, but James McClean is caught offside.
